49765.title: Brian (In Which Addison Has a Very Casual Get Together)

revisions.*:

'''Brian''' is the best friend of [[Michael (In Which Addison Has a Very Casual Get Together)|Michael]], who had a crush on him.

==History==
Brian was shocked when his best friend, Michael, asked him out on a date. He responded by beating Michael up. When Michael went missing, Cooper came to Brian and asked if he knew where Michael was. When pressed, Brian mentioned a parking lot where they liked to skateboard together sometimes. Cooper used that information to find Michael.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He is friends with Michael. However, when Michael asked him out on a date, he responded by beating Michael up.
